section.p: To use this package you need the following software packages:

ol.li: If you want to install from source, a C compiler supported by distutils;
if you want to use TOXICAction or TOXICPrettifyAction for generating Oracle functions with ll.make: ll-toxic (version 0.7 or later);
if you want to use FOPAction for generating &pdf; from XSL-FO with ll.make: Apache FOP.
if you want to install this package as an egg: setuptools.
if you want to run the test suite: py.test.

section.p: distutils is used for installation, so it's rather simple. Execute the following command:
This will compile the C sources and copy the required files to the site-packages directory as part of the ll package.
For Windows a binary distribution is provided. To install it, double click it and follow the instructions.
setuptools is supported for installation, so if you have setuptools installed the package will be installed as an egg.
If you have difficulties installing this software, send a problem report to Walter Dörwald (walter@livinglogic.de).
